text: Kaya Toast set at 3.90 SGD only here at Green 88 Coffee & Bread! 😉🥰💯
Very nice coffee and bread. Friendly staff.

Congratulations on the new opening! Newly opened! Good coffee & toast set! Vietnamese Sandwiches are pretty nice too! Crispy & spicy! Prefer the pork sausage sandwich to chicken.
Yes! We have a new winner over here in Empress Market! The coffee☕bread🍞are both good!
The Vietnamese sandwich is one of a kind! Spicy and crunchy! Great! Diners have more options!!! 👍Like it!
Updated 27 April 2025 ....last photo !!! Consistent !!!!
